title: 3.12 Investing in shares - preliminary discussion
description:
In this preliminary discussion, we share some intuitive principles that should help us when deciding to invest in shares. Aim today is to frame the issues and challenge the way we usually look at the topic itself and market participants in particular. More discussions about screening rules and various rulings will follow later on insha'Allah.

Topics: Shariah-compliant vs Shairah-based business, speculators, investors, stock, day traders, leadership.
